recipe_name: Chorizo and potato hash with poached egg
author: Tony Tobin
method: Heat a frying pan and fry the chorizo for 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently. Add the sliced cooked potatoes and the spring onion and cook gently, stirring occasionally, for five minutes. Slightly crush the potatoes with a fork and mix well to combine the ingredients. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. To serve, place the chorizo and potato hash onto a serving plate and top with a poached egg.
ingredients: 225g/8oz chorizo, sliced,  85g/3oz new potatoes, cooked and sliced,  1 spring onion, chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 free-range egg, poached, to serve
